price: ߞߏ߫ ߣߌ߫ ߞߊ߬ߥߊ߲߬ߘߌ߬ ( ߟߍߙߊ߫ ) ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߒ߬ ߓߟߏ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߝߘߊ߫ ߝߟߐߡߐ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
